action.action-desc: Mr. Engel (for himself, Mrs. Carolyn B. Maloney of New York, and Mr. Hastings) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to treat flamethrowers the same as machineguns.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Flamethrowers? Really? Act.

section.header: Flamethrowers treated the same as machineguns for purposes of all Federal criminal laws relating to firearms

subsection.text: Section 921(a) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The term flamethrower means any nonstationary or transportable device designed or intended to ignite and then emit or propel a burning stream of a combustible or flammable substance a distance of at least 6 feet.

subsection.text: Section 921(a)(3)(A) of such title is amended by inserting , including a flamethrower before the semicolon.
Section 922(o) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting or flamethrower after machinegun; and

subparagraph.text: by striking or at the end of subparagraph (A);
by striking the period at the end of subparagraph (B) and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:
any otherwise lawful transfer or otherwise lawful possession of a flamethrower that was lawfully possessed before the date this subparagraph takes effect.

subsection.header: Ban on unauthorized transport in interstate or foreign commerce
subsection.text: Section 922 of such title is amended in each of subsections (a)(4) and (b)(4) by inserting flamethrower, before machinegun.

subsection.header: Enhanced penalties for using, carrying, or possessing during and in relation to a crime of violence or drug trafficking crime
subsection.text: Section 924(c)(1) of such title is amended in each of subparagraphs (B)(ii) and (C)(ii) by inserting , a flamethrower, after machinegun.

subsection.header: Penalties for conspiring To commit an offense subject to certain enhanced penalties
subsection.text: Section 924(o) of such title is amended by inserting , flamethrower, after machinegun.

subsection.header: Exception from requirement To allow importation of an unserviceable firearm that is a curio or museum piece
subsection.text: Section 925(d)(2) of such title is amended by inserting a flamethrower or before a machinegun.
